item.title: Dougray Scott to Play Hans Christian Andersen in Omega Global Media’s Crime Drama ‘Fairytale Detective’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Dougray Scott (“Mission: Impossible 2,” “Desperate Housewives”) will embody iconic Danish author Hans Christian Andersen in “Fairytale Detective,” a new crime drama
